select

select from user where id < (select id from teacher where id <= 5)

select
from user left join teacher on user.id = teacher.id where id < (select id from user where id <= 5)

select
from user t1 left join teacher t2 on t1.id = t2.id where t1.id < (select id from user t3 where id <= 5)

select
from user t1 left join teacher t2 on t1.id = t2.id where t1.id < (select id from user t3 where id <= (select 200 from dual))
select * from user left join (select 1 as id from dual) t2 on user.id = t2.id

select * from user t1 left join attribute t2 on t1.id = t2.id where t1.id >= (select id from user t3 where id >= (select 200 from dual)) group by t1.name ,t2.update_dt,t2.attribute_name having t1.name is not null order by t2.update_dt asc
